meanings.sent1: The corkier tree trunk floated easily on the water.
meanings.sent2: The new corkier material was better at insulating heat.
meanings.sent3: The corkier shoes made him bounce like a rubber ball.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as corkier as the popping of champagne.
meanings.sent5: The corkier texture of the wall reminded her of a soft sponge.

meanings.sent1: This wine bottle feels corkier than the last one.
meanings.sent2: The corkier surface provided a better grip for the hands.
meanings.sent3: The corkier hat made him look like a walking cork forest.
meanings.sent4: His voice sounded corkier than the squeak of a mouse.
meanings.sent5: The corkier taste of the soup brought back memories of childhood picnics.
